mean_cn: n. 【原子能】裂变，裂开，【生物学】分裂生殖
mean_en: the act or process of splitting the nucleus (= central part) of an atom, when a large amount of energy is released; the division of cells into new cells as a method of reproducing cells
sentence: In nuclear fission, atoms are broken apart to release energy.
sentence_trans: 核裂变过程中，原子会裂变，以释放能量。
